entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 12:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
